homepage.intro: Swap your cutting, or donate it. Choose from our collection of available seedlings and come and exchange your exchange your cutting with us!

errorplant.title: 404 Error
errorplant.intro: We couldn't find the plant you were looking for.

stepdescription.step-1: Take a picture or upload one below. We will help you to find the name and needs of your plant.
stepdescription.step-2: Select the plant that matches your plant.
stepdescription.step-3: Fill in the details of your plant.
stepdescription.step-4: Select a plant to swap with.
stepdescription.step-5: Beschrijvende tekst, voor het maken van een afspraak.

uploader.title: Tap to take or upload an image of your plant.

userForms.tip_description: We reserveren de plant tot uiterlijk 3 dagen nadat je hebt aangegeven deze op te komen halen.
